import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./Login.css";import backgroundImage from"../../assets/login.jpg";// ✅ Import image correctly
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login",{email,password});console.log(res.data);alert("Login Successful!");navigate("/dashboard");}catch(err){console.error(err);alert("Invalid Credentials!");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-page",style:{backgroundImage:`url(${backgroundImage})`,backgroundSize:"cover",backgroundPosition:"center",width:"100vw",height:"100vh"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-cube",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]})]})});}export default Login;
